moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Roar
moves.description: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Ember
moves.description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Odor Sleuth
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit with Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of its attack.

moves.name: Flame Wheel
moves.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Fire Fang
moves.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

moves.name: Flame Burst
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Retaliate
moves.description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack's damage increases.

moves.name: Flamethrower
moves.description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Heat Wave
moves.description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing team. It may also leave targets with a burn.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The user sustains serious damage and may leave the target burned.
